title: 820-3332 Display issues
message: So I have an 820-3332 on the bench and the display seems to have issues. The screen doesn?t do anything but when I hook another screen up it will sometimes come on then go off, and then it will blink on for a moment then turn off but the computer will run. I can?t get an image to show up via TB ports either. Is it just me, or did my customer get taken for a ride on this purchase?

title: 820-3332 Display issues
message:
Start resoldering U8900 chip.
Use leaded solder and be sure to get good solders...

title: 820-3332 Display issues
message: Wow, really that was it? That was super easy. Is this a common flaw with this machine?

title: 820-3332 Display issues
message: Is known as common failure for 820-3332 board model.
